mapper.update: update T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD set RR_TIME=#{time},RR_STATE=#{state} where RR_ID=#{id}
update T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD set RR_STATE=#{state} where RR_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select rr.RR_ID,rr.RR_RESID,rr.RR_RECID,rr.RR_TIME,rr.RR_STATE, r.R_ID,r.R_ACCID,r.R_NAME,r.R_BIRTH,r.R_SEX,r.R_PHONE,r.R_ADDRESS,r.R_EMAIL,r.R_EDUCATION,r.R_MAJOR,r.R_EXPERIENCE from T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD rr,T_RESUME r where rr.RR_RESID=r.R_ID and rr.RR_RECID=#{recId} and RR_STATE=0

select r.RR_ID,r.RR_RESID,r.RR_RECID,r.RR_TIME,r.RR_STATE, r.R_ID,r.R_ACCID,r.R_NAME,r.R_BIRTH,r.R_SEX,r.R_PHONE,r.R_ADDRESS,r.R_EMAIL,r.R_EDUCATION,r.R_MAJOR,r.R_EXPERIENCE from (select rownum rn,rr.*,r.* from T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD rr,T_RESUME r where rr.RR_RESID=r.R_ID and rr.RR_RECID=#{recId} and RR_STATE=0 and ROWNUM <=#{show})r where r.rn >=#{current}

select rr.RR_ID,rr.RR_RESID,rr.RR_RECID,rr.RR_TIME,rr.RR_STATE, p.P_ID,p.P_NAME,p.P_CREATETIME,p.P_DEPID,d.D_ID,d.D_NAME,d.D_CREATETIM,s.S_ID,s.S_RESID,s.S_SALARY from T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD rr,T_DEPARTMENT d,T_POSITION p,T_RESUME r,T_RECRUITMENT rec,T_SALARY s where rr.RR_RESID=r.R_ID and r.R_ACCID=#{accId} and rec.R_ID=rr.RR_RECID and rec.R_POSID=p.P_ID and p.P_ID=d.D_ID and r.R_ID=s.S_RESID and rr.RR_TIME is not null

select r.RR_ID,r.RR_RESID,r.RR_RECID,r.RR_TIME,r.RR_STATE, r.P_ID,r.P_NAME,r.P_CREATETIME,r.P_DEPID,r.D_ID,r.D_NAME,r.D_CREATETIM,r.S_ID,r.S_RESID,r.S_SALARY from (select rownum rn,rr.*,d.*,p.* ,s.*from T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD rr,T_DEPARTMENT d,T_POSITION p,T_RESUME r,T_RECRUITMENT rec,T_SALARY s where rr.RR_RESID=r.R_ID and r.R_ACCID=#{accId} and rec.R_ID=rr.RR_RECID and rec.R_POSID=p.P_ID and p.P_ID=d.D_ID and r.R_ID=s.S_RESID and rr.RR_TIME is not null and ROWNUM <=#{show})r where r.rn >=#{current}
select rr.RR_ID,rr.RR_RESID,rr.RR_RECID,rr.RR_TIME,rr.RR_STATE from T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD rr where RR_ID=#{id}
